effect.black-white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
effect.black-2-white-2: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

short_effect.black-white: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
short_effect.black-2-white-2: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.black-white: The user attacks with a punch that can shatter a rock. It may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user attacks with a punch that can shatter a rock. It may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
